name: Gorgon's Paralysis
outcome: {AttackerName}'s eyes let out a powerful yellow light as she flashes out a blast of energy from them, and as {TargetName}'s own gaze connects with hers, he feels the full blunt of the magic envelop him!
miss: {AttackerName}'s eyes let out a powerful yellow light as she flashes out a blast of energy from them, but {TargetName} manages to avert the gaze just in time, avoiding the effect!
statusOutcome: {TargetName}'s body grows increasingly stiff as the weakened petrification effect takes hold!
statusMiss: {TargetName} grits his teeth, enduring the paralyzing magic with great effort!
